entities.name: mimbulus mimbletonia
entities.description: A magical phrase that the Fat Lady says to let Harry and Ron into Hogwarts.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a magical portrait who guards the entrance to Gryffindor Tower. She is described as swinging forward once more when Harry and Ron arrive.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is described as sprinting up the stairs and trying to smile naturally while his heart continues to race.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who comes running toward him with a goblet of butterbeer. He is described as beaming all over his face and slopping butterbeer down his front.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who is dozing in an armchair by the fire. She has a drink tipping precariously in her hand.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Ron's brothers who is also at Hogwarts. He points out Hermione to Harry and Ron.

entities.name: butterbeer
entities.description: Butterbeer is a popular drink in the wizarding world that Ron and Fred are drinking from goblets.

relationships.description: Harry interacts with the Fat Lady when he says 'Mimbulus mimbletonia!' and she swings forward to let him in.
Ron greets Harry by coming running toward him with a goblet of butterbeer.
Fred points out Hermione to Harry and Ron, indicating where she is sitting.
Ron is drinking butterbeer from a goblet.
Fred is also drinking butterbeer from a goblet.
